name: ai-doc-agent
description: Chrome extension for AI-powered document processing

scripts.build: tsc && vite build && npm run copy-manifest && npm run fix-html-paths
scripts.fix-html-paths: cp dist/src/popup/index.html dist/popup.html && cp dist/src/options/index.html dist/options.html && sed -i 's|/assets/|assets/|g' dist/popup.html dist/options.html
